com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.io
Class EnumDelegate<T extends java.lang.Enum>

java.lang.Object
  java.beans.PersistenceDelegate
      com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.io.EnumDelegate<T>

public class EnumDelegate<T extends java.lang.Enum>
extends java.beans.PersistenceDelegate

Persistence delegate for enums. Why oh why didn't they implement this in Java 1.5 itself? I got this code from the Java forums and changed it a bit: http://forum.java.sun.com/thread.jspa?threadID=419927&tstart=60

martin
